definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The insect origin on the susceptive vegetables in spring and tobacco seedlings came from the broad bean fields.
sentences.chinese: 春季蔬菜及烤煙苗上南美斑潛蠅蟲源主要來自蠶豆田。

sentences.english: The ratio of chlorogenic acid to rutin in tobacco of South Africa is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 南非烤煙綠原酸和芸香苷含量的比值最低。

sentences.english: The high starch content is not favorable to quality of flue-cured tobacco leaves.
sentences.chinese: 原煙澱粉含量高不利於烤煙的吸食品質。

sentences.english: Effects of starch and its decomposing product on aroma and flavor of flue-cured tobacco leaves are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 澱粉及代謝產物對烤煙香喫味的影響。

sentences.english: The numbers of nitrobacteria around roots were increased during the later growth period by excessive application.
sentences.chinese: 過量施用增加了烤煙生育後期根際土壤硝化細菌數量。

sentences.english: Chemic fertilizer is slathered in the tobacco production nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 當前的烤煙生產中，化肥被大量使用。

sentences.english: It is mainly extracted by ethanol extract of the finished product obtained Absolute tobacco bud.
sentences.chinese: 本品主要通過乙醇萃取成品的烤煙花蕾浸膏製得淨油。

sentences.english: The study of the heat transfer performance of the heat exchanger tube used in tobacco flue-curing industry is very important.
sentences.chinese: 對於烤煙房用熱交換器換熱性能的研究具有現實意義。

definition: "kopi luwak" or civet coffee, made from coffee beans plucked from Asian palm civet's feces
(agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
